titles.title: Fire Department Repayment Act of 2025
Fire Department Repayment Act of 2025
To require the standardization of reciprocal fire suppression cost share agreements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Armed Services, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry and Horticulture.
